org.hps.readout.util

Class ObjectRingBuffer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.readout.util.RingBuffer<Set<T>,T>
      • org.hps.readout.util.ObjectRingBuffer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - - The type of object that is stored in each of the buffer's cells.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Set<T>>

    public class ObjectRingBuffer<T>
extends RingBuffer<Set<T>,T>
    Class ObjectRingBuffer is an implementation of the RingBuffer class that can store a set of parameterized objects in each of its cells. It's addToCell(int, Object) method simply adds the indicated object to the set stored in the specified cell.

    • Method Detail

      • addToCell

        public void addToCell(int position,
                      T value)
        Description copied from class: RingBuffer
        Adds a value or object to the specified buffer cell. The exact behavior can vary based on the nature of parameterized object type which the buffer contains.
        Specified by:
        addToCell in class RingBuffer<Set<T>,T>
        Parameters:
        position - - The position of the target value relative to the current value. A value of 0 represents the current position.
        value - - The object to add to the cell.

      • clearValue

        public void clearValue()
        Description copied from class: RingBuffer
        Clears the value at the current position in the buffer. The contents of the cell will be cleared as appropriate to the parameterized object type.
        Specified by:
        clearValue in class RingBuffer<Set<T>,T>
